Welcome to ichor’s documentation!

Introduction

The ichor package is a namespace package that contains three packages: ichor.core, ichor.hpc, and ichor.cli. The ichor.core packages contains mostly file management and analysis tools for the different types of files that must be read (from Gaussian, AIMAll, etc.). The ichor.hpc package contains code allows a user to submit jobs on compute clusters (SGE and SLURM). The ichor.cli packages is a menu system that allows a user to do the most common tasks without having to write individual scripts.

Below are examples of how to use ichor.

  • Examples for ichor.hpc
  • Examples for ichor.cli
